fields.name: Single Cutaway Acoustic Guitar Black
fields.short_description:
• Full-size single cutaway acoustic guitar ideal for beginners
  • Features many premium grade components found in higher-spec’d guitars
  • Easy to transport and withstands bumps and knocks with all hardwood construction
  • Ideal for a wide range of performance styles
fields.description:
Full Description


Cutaway design

The Cutaway shape is perfect for all musical styles. Unlike a traditional non-cutaway body, the cutaway grants you immediate access to the upper frets, allowing you to practice and perform scales and solos with ease. The reduction in wood also yields a brighter, more present tone to ensure you cut through when performing alongside acoustic ensembles.

Excellent components

For the best playing experience, the Single Cutaway Acoustic Guitar includes the very same components found in our top of the range models. The chrome tuning pegs guarantee smooth, stable tuning which is reinforced via the inclusion of a walnut bridge. Composed of oiled poplar laminate with white dot inlays, the dense, natural grain of the environmentally friendly, composite fretboard offers improved tone and volume, as well as being more resistant to temperature and humidity change – the main elements that cause issues with setup in acoustic guitars.

fields.name: Hartwood 15W Acoustic Guitar Amplifier
fields.short_description:
• Authentic and natural sound, designed for electro acoustic guitars
  • Refine your tone, using chorus and 3-band EQ effects
  • Aux input lets you play along with your favourite music
  • Small and portable - perfect for home practise
fields.description:
Full Description

Full amplification, with a natural sound. This acoustic guitar amp faithfully reproduces the sound of your guitar, without adding extra hype to your tone. The 6.5 inch speaker produces a range of detailed sounds with clarity. This means you get a faithful, natural sound. Just clean amplification, so you hear the true tones produced by your guitar.

Customise your sound. The 3-band equalizer allows you to adjust the bass, middle and high frequencies. There's also a chorus control to add stylistic effects to your sound. You can easily adjust how much chorus effect is applied by using the control knob.

The headphone output even allows you to practise without the speaker. You'll hear the full sound of your guitar's pickups and be able to practise applying effects and EQ settings. All without disturbing your neighbours. You can even practise and perform with backing tracks. Just connect your smartphone, media player or CD player to the Aux input.

Fully portable. This 15W acoustic guitar amp is small enough to make travelling easy. It fits into small spaces and is the perfect size for practising at home.

Specifications

  • Maximum Output Power: 15 Watts
  • Speaker Impedance: 8 Ohms
  • Speaker Size: 6.5 inches
  • Inputs: guitar (1/4" jack), aux in (3.5mm jack)
  • Outputs: headphones (1/4" jack)
  • Power Input: 220-240V AC 50/60Hz
  • Power Consumption: 20W max
  • Fuse: T1A, 250V
  • Dimensions: 300mm(w) x 290mm(h) x 180mm(d)
  • Weight: 5kg

fields.name: SubZero 25W Acoustic Guitar Amp with Chorus
fields.short_description:
• Two Channels For Instruments/Mic Input
  • Built In Chorus Function
  • 3 Band EQ
  • Aux Inputs For CD Player/MP3 Playback
fields.description:
Full Description

Ideal Practice Amp Or Small Gig Monitor

This 25W amp makes a great practice amp or is ideal for use as a monitor amp on quieter stages. A built in Chorus function adds warmth and depth to your sound whilst the 3 band EQ allows you to adapt your sound for different gig environments. The SubZero 25W amp projects your sound loud and clear through its dual-speaker system.

Multi-Input Options With Two Channels

This versatile amp is equipped with two channels; one for instruments featuring a jack input, and a second for microphones using an XLR input. This is great for singing along through a vocal mic or adding a mic for improved ambience to your acoustic sound.

Auxiliary inputs allow CD players or MP3's to be played directly through the amplifier, excellent for practising along to your favourite acoustic tracks, or providing backing during a live acoustic set.

Easy To Transport

This striking blue Acoustic Amp has a lightweight construction, corner protectors, and carry handle making it easy to transport from gig to gig.

Reviews

"If you want to hear your electro-acoustic songs amplified before you brave the stage, then this combo would be just the job ... but its eight-inch speaker easily cranks out enough volume to make it ideal for jams, too. Multi-use, stylish looks and serious sound performance for a piffling price tag, we'd say that's great value for money." - Awarded 4/5 Stars by MusicRadar

Features/Specifications

  • Power: 25w RMS @ 1.0 THD into 8 ohm
  • Input: Channel 1 / Channel 2
  • Speaker: 1 x 8" 8 Ω + 1 x 2.5" (Tweeter)
  • Input Sensitivity: Normal 50mV F = 1KHz Volume and Tone Max
  • Noise: -40dB (Gain Max) -65dB (Gain Min)
  • Dimensions: W 460mm x H 370mm x D 250mm
  • Weight: 10.7kg

fields.name: ESP LTD MH-10
fields.short_description:
• Exceptional tones flow from dual humbuckers - they thrive with any genre
  • Smooth playability courtesy of a sleek and comfortable double cutaway body
  • Fret effortlessly thanks to a fast playing neck with thin profile
  • Incredible sustain and tuning stability are produced by bridge with string thru body
fields.description:
Full Description

Perfect for ambitious players

An instrument that belies its affordable price. You might be starting out, but that doesn't mean you shouldn't have a guitar that oozes pure excellence and premium quality. The LTD MH-10 provides versatile tones and easy playability that are perfect for ambitious guitarists who don't want to be limited in sound. From its fast neck specification to the solid tonewoods and fiery humbuckers, there is an eclectic tonal palette and sumptuous playing experience waiting for you.

Effortless playability

The MH-10 has a thin "U" shaped neck that will sit easily in your hand. Crafted from maple, it delivers a smooth and resonant tone that is then matched by a silky playing feel aided by the flat 350mm radius fingerboard. The fingerboard is mounted with 24 extra jumbo frets giving you enhanced control over the strings during those fast and thrilling solos. Better still, a low-profile bolt-on neck joint and double cutaway design ensure you can reach the top frets in seamless fashion. And thanks to a lightweight basswood body, you'll never experience any of that dreaded shoulder strain. Play for hours with this magnificent guitar, its sleek design begs any fearless performance.

Maximum tone

Basswood and maple... a beautiful combination. They provide a stunning tone that is incredibly versatile and rich in clarity. Maple, which is used for the neck, ensures your sound is swimming in bright overtones and astounding articulation. Even the most complex of chords will be deliciously defined. The strings are then mounted directly through the body for enhanced sustain and resonance, giving you a wonderfully immersive sound that will never lose a touch of clarity.

This guitar is loaded with ESP Designed LH-100 pickups. They are superbly powerful and sonically flexible, meaning you can explore the wonders of as many different genres as possible. Shape it with the volume and tone controls until you have a tone that is brilliantly unique.

Specifications

  • Product Code: 314825

Body

  • Construction: Bolt-On
  • Body: Basswood
  • Finish: Black

Neck

  • Neck: Maple
  • Fingerboard: Engineered Hardwood
  • Fingerboard Radius: 350mm
  • Scale: 25.5''
  • Nut Width: 42mm
  • Nut Type: Molded
  • Neck Contour: Thin U
  • Frets/Type: 24 Xj

Hardware And Electronics

  • Hardware Color: Chrome
  • Strap Button: Standard
  • Tuners: LTD
  • Bridge: Tom W/ String Thru
  • Neck PU: ESP Designed LH-100n
  • Bridge PU: ESP Designed LH-100b
  • Electronics: Passive
  • Electronics Layout: Vol/Tone/3-Way Switch

Accessories

  • Strings: (.010/.013/.017/.026/.036/.046)
  • Case: Gig Bag Included

fields.name: Ibanez GSR180 GIO Bass
fields.short_description:
• Stunning tone captured by a set of Dynamix J pickups
  • Warm, full-bodied tone produced by a pristine poplar body
  • Excellent playability offered through a New Zealand pine fretboard
  • Impeccable tuning stability thanks to a B10 bridge
fields.description:
Full Description

Top-tier design

Ibanez are masters of their craft, and of course, the GSR180 is no exception. Constructed from poplar the body has been shaped and contoured to ensure the utmost comfort, something that is also supported through the lightweight nature of the wood. Poplar possesses a brilliant natural tone with a fantastic high-end, a compact but defined mid-range, and crisp lows. With this tonal consideration and comfortable performance, you will be able to play to the best of your abilities.

Pine playability

This bass plays like a dream, guaranteeing comfort, speed, and precision, it's everything a bassist can ask for. A delightful maple neck fits your hand like a glove, ensuring that you have control of the instrument with a firm but freeing grasp. This maple neck is fronted with a New Zealand pine fretboard which provides a flawless surface to accurately boom your basslines with accuracy and articulation.

Versatile Dynamix pickups

The GSR180 is equipped with a fantastic pair of Dynamix J pickups at the neck and bridge. Offering sweet mellow tones as well as a driven destructive punch these pickups are incredibly versatile pushing your tone out with clarity and articulation ensuring that every note chimes with the correct intonation. Partnered with individual volume controls for each pickup, and a shared master tone, you can truly draw out the soundscape that you desire.

About Ibanez Basses

Over the past 30 years, Ibanez has always been at the forefront of developing the right tools for players pushing the boundaries of music. For decades, Ibanez designers and luthiers have been the embodiment of this ideology, pushing their skills to the edge of imagination, consistently creating some of the most versatile and unique instruments ever. Ibanez basses have been used on some of modern rock's most poignant albums of recent years. The preferred instruments of many awe-inspiring bass players, amongst them Fieldy from Korn, Paul Gray from Slipknot, and Peter Iwers of In Flames, Ibanez Basses continue to be the first stop for learners and professionals alike, no matter what musical genre they exist in.

Specifications

  • Bridge: B10 (19mm String Spacing)
  • Construction: Bolt-On
  • Finish: Black

Neck & Fingerboard

  • Neck: Maple

  • Scale Length: 34’’

  • Case Included: No

fields.name: Korg Pitchclip 2 Tuner
fields.short_description:
• Compact & Stylish Design w/ Enlarged Screen For Better Visibility
  • Improved & Enhanced Holding Power w/ Rubber Grips For Protection
  • Designed From The Players Point of View For Precise & Easy Tuning
  • Improved Detection Accuracy For Precise & Stable Tuning
  • Auto-Power-Off Function Saves Battery Life When Not In Use
fields.description:
Full Description

Improved Clip Mechanism

Korg have endured numerous trials to improve the Pitch Clip's mechanism and holding power, resulting in a 140 percent improvement to the holding power in comparison to the previous model. Additionally, the improved clip mechanism and enhanced holding power ensures the tuner stays firmly attached to the headstock, preventing the likeliness of it falling off. The 140 percent improvement to the holding power has also increased accuracy by providing a secure connection. Furthermore, the Korg Pitch Clip also has rubber grips that protect the player's instrument, whether it be an acoustic or electric guitar, bass guitar, or ukulele, the Korg Pitch Clip 2 is designed for use with any instrument.

Compact & Stylish Design

The Korg Pitch Clip 2 Tuner carries on the original Pitch Clip design, with a compact, easy-to-use functionality, designed to perform anywhere. Additionally, the Pitch Clip 2 offers a thinner display with a more simplistic, stylish design. The Pitch Clip also has an enlarged screen, resulting in better visibility that belies the unit's compact size. In addition, the Pitch Clip 2 can be adjusted at a 120-degree angle, enabling the player to view the screen in their most natural and comfortable position with optimal visibility.

Easy-to-Read LED Display

With an improved LED screen, the player is certain to quickly achieve precise tuning of the desired pitch with ease. Additionally, the Pitch Clip 2's left and right LEDs flash alongside the center LED, ensuring the player knows when they are in the correct pitch. Furthermore, the improved LED display also ensures precise and easy tuning whether practicing in a brightly-lit environment or tuning within dark, dim backstage rooms, the Korg Pitch Clip 2 ensures precision and brilliant visibility.

Improved Detection Accuracy

Korg have thoroughly tested the mounting location of the piezo sensor to try improve detection accuracy, resulting in Korg achieving an incredible boost to the tuner's detection sensitivity, especially within the low frequency region. Additionally, this improvement is more noticeable for DADGAD and various other drop tunings. Furthermore, the 5 or 6 string bass player is certain to adore the Korg Pitch Clip 2, providing stable and precise tuning to an instruments that have been previously classed as 'problematic' for stable tuning.

Reverse Function

For the left handed player or the player who likes to attach their tuner to the back side of the headstock, this idyllic, affordable, and compact unit offers a reverse function that vertically inverts the meter display. To achieve this, hold and press the switch to vertically invert the meter display, providing the player with visibility and precision whether attached to the front or back of the headstock, designed to meet the player's needs.

Battery Life

The Korg Pitch Clip 2 Tuner comes with a widely-available lithium coin cell battery that provides the player with approximately 24-hours of continuous use, perfect for long recording sessions and busy musicians with multiple gigs. Furthermore, the Pitch Clip 2 also features an incredibly useful auto-power-off function, which after approximately three minutes automatically turns off the power when no sound is detected.

Specifications

  • Detection Range: AO (27.5Hz) - C8 (4186Hz
  • Detection Accuracy: +/-1 Cent
  • Power Supply: CR2032 Lithium Battery
  • Battery Life: Approx. 24 Hours (A4 Input)
  • Colour: Black
  • Model: Pitch Clip 2

  • Compact and neat gadget that will fit into any gig bag

Full Description

Chromatically capable

Not only is the Eclipse Tuner easy to use and viewable from any angle, but it also has the advantage of being a chromatic tuner. This means it'll pick up the sharps and flats as well as regular notes. Tune how you want, where you want. The Eclipse will give you accuracy even if you have a capo applied.

Simple and suitable

Because of the clip-on design, the Eclipse fits with a wide range of right or left-handed instruments, regardless of their size. Always be ready. The auto-off function provides great battery life and ensures that it's prepared for your gigs. Coupled with its discreet size you've got a valuable device that can go anywhere and fit anything.

Specifications

fields.name: Roland MOBILE AC Acoustic Chorus Guitar Amp
fields.short_description:
• Powerful voicing delivered from two 4" speakers
  • Perform anywhere, anytime thanks to battery powered pack
  • Shape you sound to suit your style with control knobs
  • Perfect for gigging musicians due to compact size
fields.description:
Full Description

Rich stereo sound

The MOBILE AC may be compact, but it still features two four-inch speakers that produce a surprisingly large and lush stereo sound. Immerse yourself in its thick, swirling sound. Also included is an onboard reverb with a dedicated control knob, alongside a wide effect for adding a specious sound. For the final polish, turn the tone knob for a brighter or milder voicing.

Strum, sing, and jam along

Strap on your guitar, invite a friend, and grab a microphone. This amplifier comes designed with inputs for both guitar and microphone, alongside independent volume controls for each. You can even add lush reverb and wide effects to the instrument and voice. Perform with a polished, professional sound. Also included is a third input for connecting a media player such as an iPod. Practice and perform along with some of your favourite tracks.

Travel friendly

Small and lightweight enough to fit into a backpack, the MOBILE AC is ready to travel. Take it anywhere you go – to the studio, to your rehearsal, or even out busking. When running on its six AA batteries, this amplifier can run for up to fifteen hours at a time. However, if you don’t have batteries on hand, you can also use an AC adapter. Take your talent on the go.

fields.name: Squier Sonic Esquire H MN
fields.short_description:
• Experience a powerful and punchy performance
  • Full-bodied and dynamic tone produced by ceramic humbucker
  • Lively and vibrant sound delivered by maple neck and fingerboard
  • Comfortable playability thanks to gloss and satin finish
fields.description:
Full Description

Punchy and powerful tones

In the neck position of this model sits a singular ceramic humbucker, which provides it with a powerful punch. A sound guaranteed to turn heads wherever you play. Thanks to this pickup, your Squier is infused with a full-bodied tone that is packed with character and crunch. Not only that, but its undertones are deep, smooth, and rich. Wanting to change up your tone? Featured on the body is a control that lets you shape your sound to suit your performance style.

The perfect combination of tonewoods

Although the tone is primarily produced by the humbucker, the materials also play a minor part in the sound of your guitar. They add some beautiful overtones that bring the overall sound together. The body has been sculpted from poplar, which ensures your tone is well-rounded and articulate, whilst the maple neck and fingerboard offer brightness and transparency.

Natural performance feel

Alongside its incredible harmonics, the Esquire also offers comfortable playability. Each of the materials used to sculpt this model have been topped with a sublime finish. Its poplar body has been topped with gloss, which ensures that your arm glides across the body with each pluck and strum of the strings. Even during the sweatiest of performances, your transitions will be smooth. The neck features a sleek satin finish, ensuring your hand glides between each fret with ease.

fields.name: Jackson JS Series RR Minion JS1X
fields.short_description:
• One of Jackson's most comfortable, easy-to-play models yet with small scale design
  • Exhilarating electric sound provided courtesy of a duo of high-output humbuckers
  • Stunning, eye-catching style makes this one of the coolest instruments ever
  • A guitar that gives you everything you need and more at a superb price
fields.description:
Full Description

Comfortable playing action

You'll never want to put the JS1X down. That's because Jackson have used their incredible amount of guitar crafting knowledge to make certain that this is one of their most playable instruments ever. Firstly, there's the small, 2/3-size scale. This applies less strain to your hand when you're trying to hit notes and chords. As a result, even the most difficult-to-play songs can become simple.

The JS1X Minion's satin-finished maple neck is incredibly smooth, meaning you can glide at pace up and down the fretboard. You'll be able to play high-octane rock chord sequences and solos with relative ease. This is the perfect instrument for anyone looking to advance their skills and become a rock god.

Powerful sound

Totally exhilarating. The Jackson JS1X is equipped with a pair of high-output humbuckers that give you maximum volume with crystal-clear clarity. You'll enjoy every solo and riff you play with piercing sharpness and scintillating definition. This is the sound of rock.

Eye-catching style

Get a guitar with a stunning aesthetic that's certain to make you the centre of attention. The Jackson JS1X has an appearance that is undeniably cool. The sharp, pointed edges of the body are incredibly distinctive, giving it an edgy, rocking style. It looks almost as exhilarating as it sounds. With a classy satin black finish, this is a unique instrument that will have you playing guitar solos in front of the mirror for hours on end.

Perfect for practice or the road

Enjoy a compact design that gives you a stack of benefits. The Jackson JS1X Minion has a 2/3-size scale, making it smaller and easier to handle than full-size guitars. This is particularly beneficial to less experienced players who are looking to practice and hone their skills on an instrument that's easy to play. It will actively help you to hit notes and chords better and more consistently.

It's a fantastic guitar for the road, too. Its smaller profile means it'll easily slot into even the most packed live setup, and can be transported comfortably. Or until you do start touring the world, the JS1X's lightweight design makes it easy for an individual to carry to and from practice sessions, whether on foot, using public transport, or in the car.

Amazing rock quality

Jackson guitars are renowned in the rock music world for providing excellent sound quality and supreme playability. They're popular with some of hard rock's most acclaimed guitarists. Adrian Smith and Dave Murray of Iron Maiden, Eddie Van Halen, Dave Mustaine and Kirk Hammett of Metallica, and many more.

When you buy a Jackson guitar, you're buying an instrument capable of releasing exhilarating, scintillating power and aggression into your music. Loved by experienced guitarists and novices alike, Jackson make hard rock guitars for players of any level. Enjoy quality fit for the very best.

fields.short_description:
• Short scale design is ideal for younger players
  • Powerful tones stem from a pair of infinity humbuckers
  • Maple neck provides supreme comfort for endless practice
  • Maximum tuning stability thanks to sturdy F106 bridge
fields.description:
Full Description

The miKro Series

The Ibanez miKro series offers the same quality and sound as the rest of their guitars, but designed with smaller hands in mind. Featuring a short-scale neck, small body design, medium frets and a GRGM neck profile, the Ibanez miKro series delivers a comfortable play for young musicians and seasoned players alike. Its small design also makes it incredibly easy transport and store, perfect for travelling musicians.

Infinite tones

A world of sound. Ibanez's famous Infinity pickups give the GRGM21 the backbone of its tone, putting power and clarity in everything you play. The bridge position is ideal for articulating those lower notes and rhythm licks, whilst the neck position will help your higher notes and lead playing stand out.

The three-way pickup selector will allow you to change your tone at the flick of a switch, so you can bring plenty of diversity to any song you play. Volume and tone knobs also give you more control over your sound, meaning you'll have plenty of inspiration to experiment and find your own unique playing style.

Only the best...

That’s what’s been used. This guitar has been crafted using materials that enhance every aspect of your performance. And that includes playability. A New Zealand pine fretboard works with the maple GRGM neck to make sure that you can reach incredible riffing speeds in maximum comfort. Experience a pure performance with no obstructions.

Robust, reliable hardware

Your musical toolkit. Equipped with robust hardware like an F106 bridge and jumbo frets, you'll find that this guitar will hold up no matter what you use it for. The bridge will keep your tuning stable, and the medium frets give you the freedom to bend and press those strings without risk of damage. The striking black night finish creates a beautiful aesthetic which is enhanced further by the chrome hardware. The affordability of this guitar makes the quality features stand out even more, and it will easily give you everything you want in terms of tone, durability and looks.

Raw tonal power

Humbucking pickups are the first choice for most modern metal and rock players due to the bright, articulate and thick tonal response. The IBZ-6 deliver nothing less than dynamic and cutting tones perfect for shredding leads and full sounding chugs. Featuring an IBZ-6 in the bridge and neck positions, with a 3-way blade style pickup selector, the GRG121DX is adept for a range of playing styles. So you can perform without limitation.

Prime playability

Super smooth. With a GRG maple neck in your hands, your playing will sound spectacular. That's because maple has a bright, punchy resonance, which helps to push your notes through the mix and emphasise them. It's also comfortable to play, allowing your hand to manoeuvre down the New Zealand pine fretboard with total freedom. Given that playability is so important in a modern guitar, this guarantees that you'll be satisfied whenever you play.

Robust, reliable hardware

Your musical toolkit. Equipped with robust hardware like an F106 bridge and jumbo frets, you'll find that this guitar will hold up no matter what you use it for. The bridge will keep your tuning stable, and the jumbo frets give you the freedom to bend and press those strings without risk of damage. The natural walnut finish creates a dark, beautiful aesthetic which is enhanced further by the black hardware. The affordability of this guitar makes the quality features stand out even more, and it will easily give you everything you want in terms of tone, durability and looks.

fields.name: Fender Champion 100 Guitar Amplifier
fields.short_description:
• 100 Watts of classic Fender tone is perfect for stage use
  • Shape your sound with onboard digital effects and amp models
  • Headphone connectivity allows for silent practice
  • An all-encompassing, versatile amplifier that thrives in any genre
fields.description:
Full Description

Explore the possibilities

You sound, your way. The Fender Champion 100 ensures you can experiment with your tone, and find the exact sound you want with ease. And it’s all thanks to the wide array of tone-shaping controls that Fender have implemented into the Fender Champion, providing enough variety to astound guitarists of any genre. Featuring one clean channel and one ‘dirty’ channel, you can kick out anything from smooth jazz to heavy metal. What’s more – each channel has its own individual EQ, letting you precisely dial in treble and bass frequencies to your taste.

But where this amplifier’s versatility really shows is with its onboard effects and amp model sounds. Decorate your guitar’s voice with reverb, chorus, delay, and many other digital effects. And combine it with the distinctive tone of multiple classic amp models, including tweed, British, and even metal. It’s innovative features like this that give the Fender Champion its immense versatility. And why it’s a first choice for guitarists of all abilities.

Crafted for practice and performance

Pure power. That’s exactly what you get with the Fender Champion 100. Boasting 100 Watts of mesmerising power, you can be sure that every note you play will be heard on stage with exceptional clarity. No matter the size of the venue, the dual 12” Fender special-design speakers ensure your tone fills the room with shimmering Fender quality. With its gigantic projection and even an included footswitch, it’s safe to say the Fender Champion is perfect for the stage.

Practise in peace. Whilst a powerful amp is ideal for the stage, they’re often inconvenient when practising at home. Luckily, Fender have included a headphone and aux input, meaning players can plug their headphones in and practise in silence. This way, you can play at any time without disturbing the neighbours. The aux input lets players connect their mobile phone, laptop, or other external devices to the amplifier, and jam along to their favourite songs. So whether you're gigging or at home, the Fender Champion delivers everything a serious musician needs out of their amplifier. Built for practice, born for performance.

fields.short_description:
• Includes amp & free footswitch!
  • Record easily with integrated 4-channel USB interface
  • Easy connectivity for external devices with FX Loop and Power Amp input
  • Jam with fluidity and remote control thanks to the bundled Line 6 footswitch
fields.description:
Full Description

Keep your playing seamless using the included footswitch

The Line 6 LFS2 Footswitch For Catalyst Amps is the ideal accessory for any Catalyst owner. It allows you to be extra fluid and dynamic in your playing thanks to the remote control it grants. With a simple tap of your foot, you can change the channel on the amp, or switch the effects on or off. And for even more flexibility, you can use the Catalyst Edit app to reassign the Effect switch to another function, for a truly customised experience.

The LFS2 includes a ten-foot, right-angled TRS cable that has plenty of length for live performing, home recording or studio setups. Expand your creative options with this handy footswitch!

Liven up the sound!

Endless sonic options. The Line 6 Catalyst features a Boost circuit customised for each amp type, along with a dedicated Reverb section consisting of six reverb types. In addition, there's 18 additional effects and an effects loop! In combination, these settings afford you an abundance of sonic customisation and refinement when selecting your sound.

Fight the power!

Whether you're recording, practising at home, or rocking out with room-shaking sounds, the Line 6 Catalyst can match your surroundings without sacrificing your tone. An adjustable power attenuator lets you operate at mute (for recording / headphones use), 0.5W, 50W and 100W power output settings. In this way you can enjoy full bodied sonics at lower volumes - without disturbing the neighbours!

  • Controls: Amp Selector, Boost, Gain, Bass, Mid, Treble, Presence, Ch Vol, Effect, Reverb, Master

fields.short_description:
• Limited Edition blonde LT25
  • Cover a wide range of styles and genres with the 30(!) in-built presets
  • Perfect for practice and home recording thanks to its compact size
  • Quickly reference your tone settings through the 1.8" colour display
fields.description:
Full Description

Set your tone

There's massive array of preset amp tones, but together with that you've got a classic EQ to fine tune each mode. Gain, volume, treble and bass let you adjust the levels to your exact taste. Combine that with the multitude of tone tones the Mustang is capable of creating, and you've got an almost limitless array of sounds to enjoy.

Plentiful presets

There's a huge wealth of presets built into the Mustang LT25, and they're ready to power your sound. Whatever genre you want to enjoy, these presets have it covered. From country music to the thickest heavy metal, you can do it all on this flexible Fender amp.

But that's not all, you can modify each of the presets on the amp or create your own! By attaching the amp to a PC with a USB cable you can use the Fender Tone 3.0 app to customise your sound even further. This digital dexterity means you're getting an almost limitless series of amps and effects pedals combined into one, and at exceptional value.

Fender finesse

Peerless construction. As one of the leading amplifier manufacturers, Fender has a well-earned reputation for their solid craftsmanship. That's on full display with the Mustang LT25, as it boasts a sturdy wood frame and robust top mounted handle. It's going to last through countless practice and jamming sessions, and you're going to be doing those a lot. A headphone socket lets you practise anytime, anywhere in silence, while the auxiliary input allows you to play alongside backing tracks or your favourite song.

fields.name: Fender Frontman 20G Guitar Amp
fields.short_description:
• Practise or perform with 20 watts of Fender power output at your command
  • Crisp and clear tonality produced by an 8" special design Fender speaker
  • Hone your tone - clean channel with EQ, and a drive channel with separate volume
  • Take it anywhere, play anywhere. A sturdy casing make it easy to transport
fields.description:
Full Description

Ferocious Fender sound

Best in class. Fender are known for their long history of creating stunning and exciting amplifiers. They've used all that experience and channelled it into the Frontman 20G, to produce an amp that's full of visual flair and sonic finesse. A single 8" special design speaker puts out 20 Watts of power, enough to make yourself heard at any practice or recording sessions. Fender's engineers have carefully balanced it, ensuring it delivers all the great tones you'd associate with their amps. It may be small, but it's got plenty of bark and roar to offer.

Sculpt your tone

It's simple to use and quick to enjoy thanks to an intuitive control layout. A clean channel provides volume and three band EQ for flexile tone shaping, so you can dial in the perfect sound that's in your head. There's plenty of room for experimentation as the Fender special design speaker will articulate each change of the EQ with clarity, so keep tinkering to change up your genre or attack.

Of course, there's also a drive channel for that exciting, dirty crunch. It's equipped with just one volume control, so you can focus on enjoying the fuzz at the perfect level. An independent volume control also lets you set it at a higher setting than the clean, if you need a bit of emphasis when switching to drive for solos or lead sections.

Excellent practice companion

The 20G make rocking out at home easier than ever, it includes an auxilliary input and headphone output to give you rehearsing options. Want to jam alongside your favourite artist? No problem, the aux in lets you plug in a device and play it through the amp.

Sometimes you've got to practice without upsetting your housemates or neighbours, and just for those times, the Frontman 20G has a headphone output, so you can hone your skills even in the dead of night.

Roadworthy

Classic Fender cosmetics. The 20G is equipped with vintage style knobs and a silver strand grille cloth to imbue it with the same chic as a twin deluxe reverb amp. It looks appealing, but that's not the only benefit of Fender construction. It's also durable, with a solid housing and reinforced corners to protect against those bumps and scrapes. Its compact size also means that moving the 20G from bedroom to the studio, or even the stage is an effortless task. Take your sound anywhere.

fields.name: Boss DS-2 Turbo Distortion
fields.short_description:
• Fat, gritty distortion from the esteemed DS-2
  • Dual distortion modes with 'Turbo' setting for both
  • Three pairs of clipping diodes for superior crunch
  • Robust protection with Boss' iconic metal housing
fields.description:
Full Description

Turbocharge your tone

The 'Turbo' mode is what makes the Boss DS-2 special. Selecting it on either distortion mode activates a midrange boost after the distortion. This goes against the mid-scooped sound that the DS-1 is known for giving the DS-2 it's own distinctive, signature sound. You now have the choice between the classic DS-1-esque sound or a beefier alternative by turning 'Turbo' operation on, making this a far more versatile beast.

Features

  • Classic BOSS distortion tones with added Turbo modes
  • Turbo Mode I produces warm and mellow distortion with flat frequency response
  • Turbo Mode II provides biting distortion with a mid-range boost, perfect for leads
  • Built-in remote jack allows users to connect an external footswitch such as the FS-5L for instant, hands-free switching between modes
  • BOSS five-year warranty

fields.name: Pro Co RAT 2 Distortion
fields.short_description:
• Classic & versatile RAT distortion
  • Soaring leads & arena rock rhythm tones
  • Intuitive & simple controls add perfect amount of gain
  • Consistent tone when disengaged thanks to true bypass
fields.description:
Full Description

The legendary RAT sound

First built by request and never intended for production, the RAT distortion has become one of the most recorded pedals in the world, holding an influence on the sound of many heavier guitar bands in recent times. A go to for so many artists, the RAT 2 signals the next generation of RAT pedal, providing then same classic RAT tones with excellent versatility to help define the sound of the past three decade’s most influential bands. The Pro Co pedal can be used as a primary distortion, excelling at delivering arena rock rhythm tones and soaring leads. It can also be used to boost solos and help you slice straight through the mix – adding that little extra kick. If all you need is a more consistent boost, this pedal can be used as your main focal point of distortion.

Powerful, intuitive controls

Featuring a 100 percent analogue signal path for vintage distortion, the RAT 2 Pedal features three powerful controls and true bypass switching. This lets you dial in the perfect tone and ensuring there’s no extra noise is added to signal when the pedal is disengaged – meaning your guitar always retains its natural tone. Turning the legendary rat filter control to the right rolls off any brittle high frequencies, and turning it to the right allows the natural brightness of your instrument to shine through the mix. The volume and distortion controls let you dial in the perfect gain for your sound, and keep the levels consistent with your tone.

Convenient design

The RAT 2 is housed within a virtually indestructible steel enclosure, and what’s more, the military-spec glass-epoxy circuit board ensures a long-lasting performance that is designed to survive all the trials of life on the road. The glow in the dark graphics pair with the LED on/off indicator to always provide optimum visibility on stage. Highly physically convenient, the heavy-duty, industrial footswitches, knobs and jacks, are all housed on a sloped pedal face which allows for easy stomping.

Specifications

General

  • Input Impedance: 1 Megohm
  • Equivalent Input Noise: -110 dB
  • Output Impedance: 1 Kilohm

fields.name: Electro Harmonix Metal Muff Distortion w/ Top Boost
fields.short_description:
• A sharp edge to the tone with footswitch activated top boost
  • Full tonal personalisation thanks to three band EQ
  • Full preservation of natural sound when inactive thanks to buffered bypass
  • Durable and gig-ready construction thanks to robust metal casing
fields.description:
Full Description

Three band EQ

The Metal Muff ensures that every aspect of your sound is fully customisable, providing you all the necessary features to fully customise your sound. A three band EQ is at the forefront of this tonal control, allowing you to sculpt all frequencies to your preference. Dialling up the treble adds that extra bit of presence for an elevated and distinct distortion, the mid dial allows you to effectively scoop the muddiness out of your guitars tone, while the bass control lets you add a thunderous boom to every strike of the guitar.

Boosted bite

If the crushing destruction and full personalisation doesn’t quite cut it, don’t worry with the Metal Muff you have the delightful Top Boost function. Utilising a combination of a footswitch (to control the activation of the pedal) and a Top Boost dial (Which controls the impact of the pedal), you can efficiently increase the presence of the higher frequencies for a level grit and dirt unseen in other pedals. Let’s be real though you can never have too much distortion!

Master crafted pedal

Electro-Harmonix have designed this pedal to be the ultimate companion on your board. Constructed from rugged die-cast material the Metal Muff can stand the stresses of touring, so you don’t need to worry about ferocious stomps in the middle of your performance. Don’t worry about the switching either, thanks to its full analogue circuit, when it is inactive the pedal provides a buffered bypass ensuring that your natural sound is preserved. Two effect status LED ensures that if you are performing in a dark room, you can quickly check the status of your brilliant pedal.

Specification

  • Circuit: Analogue
  • Bypass: Buffered Bypass
  • Audio: Mono
  • Power Supply: 9V battery included (optional 9.6VDC-200mA power adapter not included)
  • Dimensions (in): 5.75 x 4.75 x 2.5
  • Current Draw: 25 mA

fields.name: Boss OS-2 Overdrive/Distortion
fields.short_description:
• Blend hot overdrive with gritty distortion with the versatile OS-2
  • Independent OD and distortion circuits offers no compromises when it comes to tone
  • Straightforward four knob layout makes it easy dialing in dirt
  • Robust protection from Boss' iconic metal housing
fields.description:
Full Description

Balancing act

Worlds collide. The Boss OS-2 Overdrive/Distortion Pedal offers the unique ability to blend overdriven and distorted sounds into one mammoth tone. This special unit gives you both the famous DS-1 and SD-1s sounds but combining them into radical new thick, dirty tones is where the magic of this pedal lays. Interestingly, these two circuits compliment each other remarkably well thanks in part to the SD-1 clipping asymmetrically while the DS-1 clips symmetrically so you get the harmonic purity and richness of the DS-1's symmetrical clipping and the gritty crunch of the SD-1 asymmetrical clipping. If you're in need of a versatile dirt box that can access a wide range of gritty tones to suit any application, it's hard to go wrong with the OS-2.

Specifications

  • Controls: Tone, Level, Drive, Colour
  • Input Impedence: 1 M ohms
  • Output Impedence: 10 K ohms or greater
  • Power Supply: DC 9 V: Dry Battery 9 V type (6F22/9 V), AC Adaptor
  • Included: Dry Battery 9 V type (6F22/9 V)
  • Connectors: INPUT Jack, OUTPUT Jack, AC Adaptor Jack (DC 9 V)
  • Dimensions:
    • Width: 73mm
    • Depth: 129mm
    • Height: 59mm
    • Weight: 400g

fields.name: TC Electronic Flashback 2 Mini Delay
fields.short_description:
• The next Flashback Mini delay is here and has even more to offer than before
  • Ultra realistic analog and tape delays thanks to the next generation algorithms
  • Holds a world of new features such as TonePrint Editor, MASH and Tap Tempo
  • This tiny pedal works alongside guitar and FX loop signals with no flaws or fuss
fields.description:
Full Description

Experiment like never before

Take your pick. All the renowned delays are available. TC's next-generation delay algorithms offer ultra-realistic analogue, digital and tape delay tones, this time with warble and flutter effects. Use the delay control to manipulate all seven seconds of delay time. With the feedback control, infinite vibrations are made possible (think Matt Bellamy of Muse)or conversely add short and snappy bursts to give your sound the depth you've been dreaming of. The Flashback Mini also has a tap tempo that can be enabled from the TonePrint App which makes fat, bold and seductive riffs possible.

Wait, there's more...

Jen Majura. Troy Van Leeuwen. Joe Perry. These artists are just a small taste of the guitar legends that have customised tones for this pedal. As well as channelling your inner rock God, you can completely create your own delay set up with the free TonePrint editor available for Mac, PC and iPad. It's easy to send TonePrints to the Flashback Mini via the app which can be downloaded on both iPhone and Android.

All this and your tone stays just that. Yours. The dry signal is not converted meaning that your tone keeps transparency and it's rich sound. If that's not enough for you, The Flackback Mini 2 has even more impressive technology in the form of the MASH function. MASH is harnessed by the pressure you apply to the footswitch and adds a world of creative expression that is only available from select TC Electronic products.

Specifications

  • Model Name: The TC Electronic Flashback 2 Mini Delay
  • Pedal Type: Delay
  • Switching: True Bypass
  • Controls: Delay, Feedback, FX Level
  • Power: 9V power supply

fields.name: Zoom G6 Guitar Multi-Effects
fields.short_description:
• All-in-one pedalboard solution
  • Six stomp switches and expression/volume pedal
  • Chain up to 9 effects, or 7 effects and amp emulation
  • Dedicated 'Play Mode' footswitch for quickly toggling different applications
fields.description:
Full Description

Like a G6

Innovation at every turn. The Zoom G6 Guitar Multi-Effects is so much more than a standalone multi-effects pedal. It allows you to build your tone from the ground up, with expansive tonal options to sculpt your sound to perfection. To begin with, utilise extensive amp modelling to suit your preference which will form your tonal foundation. From here, choose your effect chain with a whole host of effects to choose from and link in any given order. Also available are a 2-hour looper and integrated drum machine meaning this single unit gives you all the tools to create full compositions. The options are endless.

Cutting-edge effects

Taking things up a notch, Zoom meticulously designed a range of pioneering new effects. For distortion, 'Razor Drive' uses comb filtering to control the saturation by boosting the filter at each frequency point of resonance. This can only be achieved digitally and offers a sharp, cutting distorted tone that adds real aggression and bite to your tone. Continuing the innovation is the 'Wave Shaper' effect which consists of an algorithm that saturates the signal creating additional harmonic content. This creates a remarkably thick sound with a level of saturation unavailable with usual analogue devices.

Modulation madness

Alongside their innovatory distortion counterparts are a range of radical, new modulation effects. 'Geronimo' replicates your signal three times and adds subtle sonic differences to each to deliver a modern, pioneering chorus effect. 'PolyShift' is a new take on pitch-shifting, subtle sound variances are imparted at various points along a two octave range to create a contemporary-sounding effect. Finally, 'SwellVibe' is a naturally dynamic effect that intuitively responds to your playing; instead of the effect being applied from the start, the vibrato begins only after the note is sounded for a more organic, authentic effect.

Extensive connectivity

With multiple connection options, the G6 is nothing if not versatile. The G6 has a mono input, stereo outputs with volume control, a mono FX loop, aux in, control in and headphone out for connecting to or from a wide range of devices. Using the USB port, the G6 also functions as a 2-in/2-out audio interface for Mac and PC allowing for minimalist recordings. Also available with a USB connection, Guitar Lab software allows you to browse and upload/download an endless assortment of amps, effects and artists' patches. Similarly, directly connect the G6 to the Handy Guitar Lab app via Bluetooth for wireless access. Whatever your connection preference, the G6 will be able to handle it.

Designed to be the perfect shape for longer scale electric guitars, the SubZero Extended Range Electric Guitar Gig Bag has ample space to accommodate guitars like the Subzero Rogue VI with a 30" scale length and the Generation FF7 with a 25.5-27" multiscale design, providing your instrument with a snug, comfortable fit inside. The case comes complete with strong zip fastenings and a hard-wearing external fabric, for long-lasting protection.

fields.name: Yamaha TRBX174 Electric Bass Guitar
fields.short_description:
• A comfortable, versatile, and approachable bass
  • Enjoy warm, snappy tones from single and split coil pickups
  • Play with ease of a smooth sonokeling fretboard and thin "C" shaped neck
  • Experiment with your sound using the tone and volume controls
fields.description:
Full Description

Start exploring your sound

It’s Yamaha. So you know you’ve got a professional sound. The TRBX174 features a classic pickup layout to provide you with all the rooted fundamentals, strong mids, and highs that you could ever need.

Hosting single and split coil pickups, you can riff up high or carve out grooves down low with a clear articulation. And you have all the controls you need to tweak your tone on the fly. Each pickup can be blended in with its own volume knob, while the master tone control lets you adjust the frequencies to suit your style.

On the right path...

Comfort goes a long way. And fortunately, the TRBX174 has it in abundance! A sleek, contoured body teams with a thin "C" shaped maple neck to give you ergonomic fluidity all over the scales. Suited to both sit down jamming and stand up grooving, you'll find it easy to approach the long bass scale length without hand cramp thanks to the slim neck profile.

On top of that maple neck lies a sleek sonokeling fretboard. It makes it easy for your fingers to slide from fret to fret thanks to a its soft feel, helping you build up your speed for a more engaging performance.

fields.name: Ibanez GSRM20 GIO Bass
fields.short_description:
• Small structure, thundering tones
  • Powerful and versatile sounds produced by P/J pickup duo
  • Ideal for beginners or younger players due to compact scale
  • Luxurious playing feel provided by elegant contours and silky-satin finish
fields.description:
Full Description

Decimating pickup duo

A duo of Standard P/J configured pickups are equipped on the GSRM20. This tried-and-tested combo allows the instrument to achieve everything from warm jazz sounds to thunderous rock tones. Both produce incredible tonalities. The P, which is located at the neck delivers a full and punchy tone, whilst the bridge's J ensures each and every note is clean. This Ibanez's electronics offer tonnes of versatility to experiment with.

But if you're wanting more, this bass also comes equipped with a tone control that allows you to shape your sound to suit your unique performance style. And with the two volume controls, you can edit the output of each pickup for the ultimate voicing. Test, try, experiment, and create music that is uniquely yours.

Magic miKro materials

There's nothing better than a maple neck. This material has smooth and robust qualities, ensuring you will be soaring up and down the fingerboard for years to come. What's more, it offers a bright and expressive tone to the overall sound of your instrument. This has been topped with jatoba for high levels of projection that is packed with crisp, clean, and sustained tonalities. When combined, these materials will have your beats sinking into the hearts of any crowd.

Then there's the body. Crafted from poplar, this material balances out the snappy twang of the maple and provides you with full tones that sound great at the low-end. Not only that, but this bass guitar features a cutaway profile so you can fret fearlessly at the high-end of your fingerboard with ease. It's everything you need for your sound.

Small design, big sound

Do you want to be the best but feel at a disadvantage with a standard bass because you're smaller? Ibanez understands this. So, they came up with the miKro series of bass guitars - the compact counterpart of the GIO. As a part of this series, the GSRM20 has a petite design that is aimed towards players with smaller hands. A short scale neck, medium frets, and a GSRM neck profile all lend themselves to your physique, giving you more comfort. But it still holds its own. Keeping the same looks and tone, you have all the quality of a standard-sized bass so there's no excuse. Become the bassist you were born to be.

fields.name: Cort Action Bass PJ Open Pore
fields.short_description:
• Easy playing bass with gorgeous open pore finish
  • Superb tonal clarity and versatility offered by Cort Powersound PJ Style Pickup Set
  • Natural wood grain aesthetic and enhanced acoustic resonance through open pore finish
  • Premium hard rock maple neck offers superb durability and a comfortable profile
fields.description:
Full Description

Professional hardware

Cort have fitted this bass with premium die-cast machine heads, P/J pickups, and the EB6(4) Bridge. The tuners are incredibly accurate and stay put which means you can play with confidence knowing you are always in tune. Wide-reaching tonal variety comes from the P/J pickup configuration, which gives you ample power and breathes life into your thumping basslines. Being able to blend between the staggered ‘P’ configuration which favours booming bass tones and the 'J' position gives your tone all the bite and note definition you could ever want.

Top quality woods

The Cort Action PJ Bass is made from top-quality materials like Canadian hard maple. The neck has a warm and powerful natural resonance which makes the bass feel super responsive beneath your fingers. Resting on top of the neck is a jatoba fretboard. Jatoba is a brilliant fretboard wood as it is very hard, which means it doesn’t warp. Once you have set your bass up, it will stay there, playing brilliantly for ages.

The poplar body is not only a great tonewood for beginners and professionals alike because of its lovely natural resonance, but it is also lightweight which means you won’t start to fatigue after long playing sessions.

The perfect playing neck

You get a full two full octaves of 24 frets, giving you a huge range - great for people who like options. With a double cutaway body, you can reach the very last fret with ease, making the whole range accessible. The 15.75’’ radius fretboard is quite flat and very fast to play which takes some of the stress away from your hands. This a perfect bass for learning with a sense of ease.

  • Cutaway: Double Cutaway

fields.description:
Full Description

A perfect drumming introduction

Your first experience with the drums should be a memorable one. The Mapex Tornado is a high-quality drum kit designed to capture the attention of new players. Inspiring a generation of drummers, it's one of the best selling kits worldwide. With dynamic cymbals, sturdy hardware and rich drum sounds, its modest price tag belies its true value. A kit so reliable that even intermediate and professional players on a budget won't regret their purchase.

Everything you need to play straight away

You'll want for nothing with the Mapex Tornado kit. The package includes absolutely everything you need to get set up in minutes and follow in the footsteps of your favourite drummers. As well as the bass drum and tom toms, the kit comes with a matching snare drum. The hardware stands and ball-socket tom holders allow for precise placement, meaning you can customise the kit's position for your requirements.

The Mapex touch

Produced in Mapex's manufacturing facility, the Mapex Tornado receives the same quality approval given to the company's high-end series. Forever leading the way in drum innovation, you can count on a Mapex drum kit in any musical environment. Ahead of your long and illustrious drumming journey, the Mapex Tornado is the perfect first step.

Includes:

fields.short_description:
• Ready to play package including a 5pc kit, hardware, cymbals, drum stool, and drumsticks
  • 7.5mm, 6-ply poplar shells provide a warmth, versatile tone
  • Includes a matching 14'' x 5'' wooden snare drum

fields.description:
Full Description

The perfect foundation for aspiring drummers

Whether you're picking up drumsticks for the first time, or looking to reignite an old passion for drumming, a reliable and versatile kit is essential. This all-new Revolution kit is designed with beginners and students in mind, offering a ready to play package that’s ideal for practicing the fundamental elements of drumming.

All Revolution kits are easy to set-up and come complete with everything you need as an aspiring drummer straight out of the box - including hi-hat and cymbal stands to mount the 14” hi-hat and 16” crash/ride cymbal on, as well as a bass pedal, drum stool and pair of 5A drumsticks. The complete Premier experience – all in one package.

Built to impress

All shells are constructed from 7.5mm, 6-ply poplar for incredible punch and articulation, whilst the 14” x 5” wooden snare makes Revolution a great all-rounder that can support any drummer on their newfound musical journey.

Double-braced hardware for added durability

Strong and reliable, all hardware included with Revolution is designed to support the heaviest of hitters thanks to their double braced legs. The adjustable nature of each stand ensures an optimised playing position for players of any height, allowing them to feel comfortable when sat at the kit.

An included cymbal package for immediate play

Whether you are just starting out, or forming your first band, the included cymbal package ensures beginner drummers have a great sounding set that are ideal for multiple genres. Furthermore, two expansion packs (available separately) allow you to grow with your kit by adding a 10” splash or 20” crash to your set-up.

Why Premier?

Premier acoustic drum kits have been the first choice for many drummers over the years, thanks to their unmistakable looks, legendary sound, and unparalleled feel. Revolution, as the name suggests, is a turning point in Premier’s approach to beginner drum kits. Packed full of features, it sets the new standard for affordable, all-in-one beginner packages. Ignite your passion with Premier.

Everything you need to play straight away

The Mapex touch

Produced in Mapex's manufacturing facility, the Mapex Tornado receives the same quality approval given to the company's high-end series. Forever leading the way in drum innovation, you can count on a Mapex drum kit in any musical environment. Ahead of your long and illustrious drumming journey, the Mapex Tornado is the perfect first step.

fields.description:
Full Description

45-degree bearing edge

The 45-degree bearing edge allows for a healthy combination of attack and sustain thanks to the minimal amount of contact with the head. Ludwig has introduced a slight bevel into the outer edge, slightly increasing the contact surface and providing slightly more warmth and less sustain than a typical 45-degree bearing edge would.

Five-ply hardwood shells

A construction of select hardwood provides these drums with a bright sound with a short sustain. Perfect for a punchy sound which encourages accurate rhythms. The brightness is also reinforced by the five-ply shell thickness.

Double ply heads

The batter heads in this kit are each double-ply. The two plys reduce vibrations and, much like the hardwood shell, produce a shorter sustain. They also have the effect of dulling higher frequencies and emphasising the mids and lows.

fields.description:
Full Description

Alesis Nitro Max Electronic Drum Kit

An 8-piece electronic kit that revives electronic drumming

The Alesis Nitro Max Electronic Drum Kit is a game-changer for drummers, offering an authentic playing experience without sacrificing sound quality. It includes a 10'' dual-zone mesh snare, three 8'' mesh tom pads, a kick drum tower with pedal, a 10'' crash cymbal with choke, a 10'' ride, and a 10'' hi-hat with foot controller. The kit also comes with a sturdy 4-post aluminium rack, connection cables, drumsticks, a drum key, and a power supply.

But that's not all! With the Nitro Max, you'll receive a free BFD Player virtual drum instrument with an expansion pack, offering ready-to-play kits and over 400 drum, cymbal, and percussion sounds for any musical style. The kit also includes 60 built-in play-along tracks, a sequencer, a metronome, and a performance recorder. With Bluetooth audio streaming, you can easily play along with your favourite music wirelessly. As a bonus, you'll get a 90-day free subscription to Drumeo, where you can access unlimited lessons from world-class instructors, and a 30-day free subscription to Melodics Premium with exclusive lessons to enhance your skills. Upgrade your drumming experience with the Alesis Nitro Max Electronic Drum Kit today!

5A Wood Tip Drumsticks

The perfect all-rounder drumsticks

5A Wood Tip Drumsticks by Gear4music are the perfect all-rounders. These 5A-sized sticks are ideal for a range of styles, with their wooden tips bringing out maximum body from every strike. What's more, they're suitable for players of all abilities and ages, due to their medium weight and well-balanced shape.

Drum Throne Stool by Gear4music, Black

Comfortable, adjustable and sturdy

With high-quality features such as double bracing, matte black finish hardware, a comfortable padded seat and full height adjustment, the Drum Throne Stool by Gear4music guarantees you fantastic value for money as well as a comfortable drumming experience.

Alesis DRP100 Extreme Isolating Drum Headphones

Don't let your performance suffer

With the Alesis DRP100 Isolating Headphones, you'll be able to lose yourself in your sound without interruptions. Their ergonomic over-ear design envelopes your ears to give you incredible audio isolation. Your sound stays in your headphones, and the sounds you don't want to hear are kept out. It's just you and your kit.

The DRP100s have been expertly voiced to reproduce every aspect of your electronic drum kit with incredible clarity and impact. With their ultra-wide frequency response (10Hz - 30kHz), every hit is reproduced exactly the way it should be. From the biggest bass drums to the sizzle of your cymbals - your kit sounds rich, full, and exciting. Perfect for the stage, the studio, or your bedroom.

fields.name: Premier PowerPlay Digital Drum Kit Pack
fields.short_description:
• Includes a pair of stereo headphones and drum throne
  • Premier's first digital drum kit
  • Includes 25 preset kits, 25 user kits and 25 practice songs
  • Achieve total control over the feel of the kit thanks to each pad's unique tensioning design
  • Curate your signature drum sound via 423 fully-customisable samples
fields.description:
Full Description

Heritage meets technical innovation

Established in England, Premier has been an industry leader in drums and percussion since 1922. From household names like Keith Moon (The Who) and Chris Sharrock (Oasis, Noel Gallagher's High Flying Birds), to rising talent such as Sara Leigh Shaw (The Pearl Harts) and Haydn Evans (Sundara Karma), the number of high profile drummers proud to sit behind their kits appears seemingly infinite.

The PowerPlay series sees Premier branch out into new territory with their first range of digital drum kits. Designed to play and feel just like the real thing, they are the result of 100 year’s hindsight and experience in crafting some of the finest acoustic drum kits available on the market.

It's all about the music

Incredibly intuitive. Every aspect of the PowerPlay's module has been streamlined to maximise your creative output. The inclusion of six group faders provides absolute control over the volume of the kit. In contrast to a digital on-screen mixer, these premium grade faders ensure that your approach to balancing the sound of your drum kit is instinctive.

There'll be no navigating awkward menus, deliberation or second guessing, simply adjust the faders to what feels right for you. Whether you want more kick, less snare, or even a reduction in overall volume, these faders along with separate control for aux in, headphone and master volume pots allow you to make adjustments, without ever missing a beat.

Maximum practicality

The practicality of the digital drum kit extends to the ergonomic layout of the module. The large-scale LED display with easy to view text offers a simultaneous overview of all parameters, whilst the function buttons grant you immediate access to the PowerPlay's settings' menus for maximum speed and efficiency.

Each button is purposely designed to be slightly larger than average, minimising the accidental triggering of other settings midway through your performance. You can even use the end of your drum stick to adjust the data wheel for quick, broad stroke changes.

Tailor to taste

One of the most impressive aspects of the PowerPlay is the range of flexibility on offer. You can use and edit any of the handpicked 423 drum sounds on any kit in the module. From Folk to Rock and Funk to Pop, the varied range of authentic samples included cover all popular musical styles.

With total control over the volume, pitch, panning and velocity of every pad, the drum sound of your dreams is just a few tweaks away. Adjust the pitch of the cowbell to transform it from a generic 6” to a resonant 4” or achieve that outlandish ‘80s snare sound whilst the rest of the kit remains dry. Whether you desire subtle drum room ambience, or the magnitude of a hall, the extensive range of reverb controls allow you to finesse the type, level, time, and size with an impressive level of control.

Authentic design and response

For maximum aesthetic appeal, the PowerPlay comes complete with 10” kick, snare and tom pads as well as 12” crash and ride cymbals. These mesh pads accurately emulate the response of a real drum kit, ensuring the skills that you learn on this digital kit will easily transfer to an acoustic.

The dual zone pads on the snare, toms and cymbals allow you to incorporate additional sounds into your performance whilst finding your own unique playing style, nuance by nuance. Unlike other electronic drum kits in this price range, the PowerPlay is built with a rounded frame. This means that all pads are evenly distanced to ensure the kit not only sounds like the real thing, it plays like one too!

Set-up made easy

The PowerPlay comes complete with an innovative pad tensioning design. All you need is one hexagon key (included) turn to tighten or relax the entire drum head evenly. Thanks to this, you’ll have absolute control over how authentic you want the feel of the drum kit to be. Relax the floor tom pad so it feels floppy just like the real thing, or tune the snare to feel as tight as a marching snare.

Defined by you

Although the PowerPlay comes with an extensive range of 25 preset kits and an additional 25 user-defined kits, the USB memory card slot means you can import and export kits created using the module on-demand, free from the restrictions of module memory. This is ideal for session musicians performing across a variety of genres who desire instant recall of specific sounds in high-pressure situations.

Play with feeling

When you’re a drummer, feel is everything. It’s what separates a great performer from a good one. Whether you want to reduce the track to drums and bass to focus on perfecting your groove, or want to isolate the piano to figure out its rhythm, the ability to deconstruct each of the 25 in-built songs allows you to gain a better understanding of song arrangements and how the parts interact with each other to form a cohesive whole.

Take advantage of the integrated 3.5mm auxiliary input. With this, you can easily connect any smartphone, tablet, computer, or media player to jam to your favourite songs, albums, and playlists. The ability to play alongside great musicians on demand will ensure your technical ability comes along in strides.

Capture your performances

Recording capabilities enable you to capture your performances and save them to either the module or an external USB stick as a MIDI file. The intuitive manner of the recorder ensures the recording process feels effortless.

Ready for any occasion

Practice, production, performance. The PowerPlay caters for any scenario thanks to the broad range of connectivity it offers. The inclusion of a headphone input allows you to connect any pair of 6.35mm (1/4”) stereo headphones for silent practice, whilst the L/R outputs let you to send a stereo output of your record-ready drum sound straight to a mixer or interface, without the need for additional processing.

Powerful MIDI controller

Expand the realms of what’s possible via MIDI connectivity. MIDI inputs and outputs allow you to turn the PowerPlay into a comprehensive controller that can be used in conjunction with any Digital Audio Workstation (DAW). In an age where music is fine-tuned and quantised to within an inch of its life, the PowerPlay empowers you to inject a new lease of life into your programmed drum parts with that unmistakable human touch.

When connected to a computer, the module’s internal sound library is bypassed, allowing you to perform with your favourite stock and third-party virtual drum libraries and applications. This is perfect for opening up a world full of additional drum sounds.

Practice makes perfect

Be the best drummer you can be with the multiple practice modes on offer. "Warm Up" mode provides the perfect introduction to playing, with tasks designed to enhance your beat accuracy and master techniques such as paradiddles, rolls, strokes and more. "Quiet" mode sees you accompanied by a metronome which cuts out for periods of time, allowing you to focus on keeping time with and without guidance to enhance your own internal metronome.

What's included?

  • Premier PowerPlay Digital Drum Kit

  • SubZero SZ-H100 Stereo Headphones

  • Drum Throne Stool by Gear4music, Black

Specifications

  • Preset Kits: 25

  • Metronome: Yes, 20-260 BPM

  • Jack: USB Memory (USB Type A)
  • Aux: 3.5mm
  • USB MIDI: USB Type B

  • R: 6.35mm
  • MIDI In: 6core DIN
  • MIDI Out: 6core DIN
  • Data In: DB25

fields.name: WHD 650-DX Mesh Electronic Drum Kit
fields.short_description:
• Includes drum throne, sticks and headphones
  • Premium digital drum kit, with quiet mesh drum heads and chokeable cymbals
  • Velocity sensitive pads - Hi-hat, snare, kick, three toms and two cymbals
  • 40 preset kits, 20 user Kits, 580 voices, 17 hi-hat combinations
  • Easy-to-use mix faders let you adjust presets as you play
fields.description:
Full Description

Included in this pack:

  • Drumsticks
  • Drum Throne
  • Stereo Headphones by Gear4music
  • WHD 650-DX Electronic Drum kit

The Full Drumming Experience - With Mesh heads and Chokeable Cymbals

The WHD 650-DX Electronic Drum Kit is equipped with mesh heads on all of the drums, including the kick drum, which give an authentic drumming experience. Being carefully designed to feel as much like an acoustic drum as possible, the pads are also dual-zone, offering rim shots as well as drum hits, keeping the volume down without sacrificing the playing experience. The crash and ride cymbals have a choke function, the ride cymbal also has a bell function, making the whole kit as close to acoustic drums as is possible, allowing the transfer of skills to an acoustic kit - a great practice or performance tool. Each mesh head is fully tuneable with a standard drum key, tighten the heads for a quick, snappy resonse or loosen to increase resistance, excellent for building strength and accuracy when transferred to an acoustic kit.

Realistic, Detailed and Dynamic Drum Sounds

The WHD 650-DX Electronic Drum Kit has a generous 580 drum and percussion sounds, as well as 17 hi-hat combinations, which have been arranged into 35 great-sounding preset kits. These sounds can be used individually to create your own custom kits, and 20 user kits can be stored for future use. Adjust each drums pitch, pan, decay and reverb for a personalised experience.

Every preset kit has realistic response and articulation to recreate the experience of playing the drums. In addition, five of the presets have even more layers of sounds - providing unmatched detail for the discerning professional. Trigger settings are adjustable, giving you full control on the sensitivity of the pads, rims and cross-talk between pads, letting you tailor the kit to your preferences. Overall a Master Compression setting is also fully adjustable, ensuring the samples will not be distorted, even when playing the ekit at loud volume levels.

The Perfect Practice Tool with Versatile Computer Connectivity

This kit has 80 tempo-adjustable preset songs that have been selected to give a wide range of fun and informative tracks for playing along, as well as space for five recorded tracks. Perfect for practice, the drum track can be removed so you can take this role yourself. In addition to this, an inbuilt metronome helps improve your playing. Choose between a large range of tempos spanning from 30bpm to 280bpm to help build speed and accuracy. A choice of different metronome sounds are selectable to use for those who find a single noise distracting, find the style that suits you. Scroll between a number of time signatures and intervals, making sure you are able to practice any piece. The WHD 650-DX offers pro-level versatility, allowing the option to send the click through the headphones and main amplifier output - perfect for drum lessons and demonstrations - or to just have the click from through the headphones, perfect for gigging situations!

For home practice and drum lessons, the coach mode is a valuable tool to improving timing and encouraging smooth playing when playing a range of note values. The visual indicator shows you if you are ahead or behind the beat, as well as scoring your accuracy, tempo can be adjusted when you have mastered a rhythm to practice faster or slower. Record yourself playing and listen back to track your progress.

Specifications

Providing a balanced stick sound combined with medium weight and volume these hats ensure you can sound your best, providing all the quality sounds of a high-tier cymbal at an affordable price. The response of the 101 Brass cymbals provide ultimate hi-hat control, with a bright and defined chick sound easily cutting through any mix and providing an impeccable sound. Due to clean tones and short sustain, these hats are perfect for any ability drummer. With qualities suited to a large range of music genres and playing situations including live performance, these cymbals are simply a great all-rounder.

fields.name: Sabian SBR Promo Cymbal Set With Free 10" Splash
fields.short_description:
• Includes SBR 10'' Splash, 14'' Hi-Hat, 16'' Crash and a 20'' Ride
  • Influenced by award-winning series to replicate great look and sound
  • Hammered and lathed surfaces provide tight, focused sounds
  • Brass construction provides clear stick definition
fields.description:
Full Description

Sabian SBR Series

The SBR cymbals receive hand-guided hammering, using a peen that has been hand-shaped specifically for brass. Once complete, they are tested for their sound and appearance before receiving a Sabian stamp of approval. The hand-guided hammering is used to add musicality and complexity alongside producing a bright tone.

Brass construction

The Sabian SBR Cymbals are made of brass which gives them a slightly muffled sound compared to bronze alloys. Thanks to the small designs, the SBR cymbals can quickly punch in and quickly disappear, exactly how a splash should be. If you are looking for a range of cymbal with a fast, punchy and splashy accent response, the Sabian SBR Series is perfect.

SBR 10'' Splash

Sabian SBR 10'' Splash Cymbal features a small design with an extra thin weight, providing a quick response and decay, making it perfect for adding a change in dynamics with one of your songs. Additionally, this makes it a lot easier to play, as you do not need as much power to create the same sound, making it ideal for beginners. Thin weight provides a fast, punchy tone that cuts through your mix with a high attack.

SBR 14'' Hi-Hat

The Sabian SBR 14'' Hi-Hats are designed to make playing easy and enjoyable thanks to their brass construction. The Sabian SBR 14'' Hi-Hats feature a hammered and lathed surface with tightly focused sounds of pure brass. These cymbals are ideal as a first step into the cymbal world at an affordable price, the looks and sounds of these Hi-Hats put them in a class of their own. The Sabian SBR 14'' Hi-Hats are high-quality, brass-made hi-hats that produce tight, clean sounds when closed, and loud, sustained tones when open. The SBR Hi-Hats delivers a tight, focused and bright sound, making them ideal for beginners.

SBR 16'' Crash Cymbal

Made from brass, the Sabian SBR 16'' Crash Cymbal sets the bar for all other cymbals in terms of look and sound. Featuring a thin weight and bright sound, the SBR Crash is quick to react, delivering a loud and punchy sound for accenting. The thin design also means it is easier to play as it doesn't require as much power compared to heavier crash cymbals, this makes the Sabian SBR Crash Cymbal perfect if you are a beginner who is still finding your feet with the drums.

SBR 20'' Ride Cymbal

The Sabian SBR 20'' Ride Cymbal is a perfect cymbal for a beginner, providing you with a cymbal that is durable, versatile and has a great tone that is ideal for any style or genre. The SBR Ride features a brass construction, which helps to deliver a strong and clean stick definition, so you can hear every hit. Featuring a bright bell, the Sabian SBR 20'' Ride Cymbal delivers a clean and bright bell sound that allows you to produce a range of tones. With its 20'' size, the Sabian SBR Ride produces a full and long ride tone.

About Sabian

From modern to vintage, Sabian cymbals are used in almost every musical genre, by some of the biggest names in drumming. Sabian are always the first choice for leading drummers such as Chad Smith, Mike Portnoy, Dave Weckl, Neil Pert and many more. Sabian strive to create cymbals and sounds that are right for you and what you do. Popular cymbals such as the B8 cymbal series are the world leading series for quality bronze cymbals at a very accessible price, offering bronze quality design, tight and bright sound.

What's Included?

  • Free SBR 10'' splash
  • SBR 14'' hats
  • SBR 16'' crash
  • SBR 20'' ride

Specifications

  • Style: Focused
  • Metal: Brass
  • Finish: Natural

The Paiste 101 Brass Hi-Hats are extremely versatile - performing perfectly in a range of genres and playing styles.

Paiste 101 Brass 16'' Crash Cymbal

The Paiste 101 Brass 16'' Crash Cymbal is an affordable and high-performance crash cymbal which provides a great introduction to Paiste cymbals. Constructed from a Brass alloy and delivering a medium sustain, quick attack and dark, full tone, the 101 Brass 16'' Crash Cymbal is a welcome addition to any drum kit.

Paiste 101 Brass 20'' Ride Cymbal

The Paiste 101 Brass 20 Inch Ride is a high-performance Brass ride cymbal which offers impressive Paiste quality and durability at an affordable price. With a medium sustain and medium-heavy weight, the 101 Brass Ride is perfect for a variety of playing styles and produces a dark, full, focused and balanced tone.
