fields.name: Meinl Classics Custom Dark Cymbal Box Set with 18'' Crash & Bag
fields.short_description:
• A loud and bright punch that stands out in every style of music
  • Dark, complex tones with crisp clarity
  • Perfect for all styles of music
  • Includes a 14'' hi-hat, 16'' crash, 20'' ride and a free 18'' crash
  • Meinl Standard Cymbal Bag offers great protection during travel
fields.description:
Full Description

Loud, cutting hi-hat with an aggressive attack

The Meinl Classics Custom 14'' Dark Hi-Hats provide bright tones with a strong, aggressive attack and excellent stick definition every time you play them. The tone is given an additional touch of warmth due to the additional hammering during construction. The hats provide a loud, cutting chick sound with a powerful open wash and a tight, articulate closed sound. Constructed from a medium weight top cymbal and a medium weight bottom cymbal, the Classics Custom 14'' Dark Hi-Hats are the perfect addition to any drum setup.

Dynamic crashes with powerful, explosive attack

The Meinl Classics Custom Dark Cymbal Set includes a pair of dark crash cymbals, sized 16'' and 18''. Having the decision between two cymbals in a setup gives you different tones and pitch, allowing you to create exciting and powerful rhythms. The Meinl Classics Custom Dark Crash Cymbals deliver a full frequency range with a wide, full tonal spread. The explosive attack and strong projection from the crash cymbals allow you to cut through any sound you may come up against.

Rich, singing ride with wide dynamic range

The Meinl Customs Classic 20'' Dark Ride Cymbal boasts incredible versatility, producing a full spectrum of overtones when played with enough force to open up the cymbal's true tone. When played with this level of power, the 20'' Dark Ride becomes a very innovative cymbal that performs perfectly in any drumming style or genre. The balance of stick definition and wash further lends towards the cymbal's versatility. The tone is given an additional touch of warmth due to the deep hammering and extra lathing.

Meinl MSTCB22 22" Standard Cymbal Bag

The MEINL Standard Cymbal Bag holds cymbals up to 22” in diameter. It is produced according to Meinl’s high quality standards, with an attractive look and an affordable price.

Includes

  • Meinl Classics Custom 14'' Dark Hi-Hats
  • Meinl Classics Custom 16'' Dark Crash Cymbal
  • Meinl Classics Custom 20'' Dark Ride Cymbal
  • FREE Meinl Classics Custom 18'' Dark Crash Cymbal
  • Meinl MSTCB22 22" Standard Cymbal Bag

Specifications

  • Material: B10 Bronze Alloy
  • Pitch: Medium to High
  • Volume: Medium
  • Sustain: Medium
  • Lathe: Wide Blade
  • Finish: Dark

fields.name: Roland Go:Piano 61 Key Digital Piano
fields.short_description:
• Free online tuition from Skoove
  • Premium 61-key piano performance
  • Learn with unlimited online songs and lessons
  • Metronome, transpose, and recording features
  • Compact and lightweight for convenient playing
fields.description:
Full Description

Quality Sounds

Delivering a range of onboard sounds, the impressive tone is derived from Roland's acclaimed premium pianos. Each note has its own character, changing seamlessly in response to your touch, similar to a grand acoustic. This feature allows you to bring dynamics to your playing and will push you to further improve your technique as you advance.

Go:Piano also includes sounds from a range of instruments, such as electric pianos, organs and strings, which allows you to explore an assortment of different musical styles.

Bluetooth Connectivity

Using the Go:Piano and a smart device, anyone can learn to play piano. Connect via Roland's Piano Partner 2 app and open up a world of interactivity. You can access third party learning apps such as Skoove which progresses beginners and advanced players to new heights, with instant feedback on your performance . The Bluetooth connectivity also allows anyone to stream music directly to the piano's speakers. This feature is ideal for playing along to your favourite songs, as well as using as a portable speaker system. The loud volume output is ideal for use in the home, rehearsal room or outdoors.

Make Music Anywhere

The lightweight, compact design of the Go:Piano makes it ideal for the travelling musician. The battery compatibility allows you to stream and play your music anywhere. This is ideal for band rehearsals as well as touring musicians requiring an instrument with quick setup. Thanks to the Bluetooth connectivity, your Go:Piano is not just an instrument but a portable speaker too. The easy to use controls are ideal for people taking their music on the go.

Traditional Piano Feel

Lightweight and compact, the Go:Piano features semi-weighted standard size keys that are inspired by the keyboards on acoustic grand pianos. The depth to the keybed allows a full keystroke action, whilst the 3 types of touch sensitivity let you pick your preference. The Go:Piano’s ivory touch keys have a satin finish to absorb moisture from your fingertips and allow for a confident and controlled performance. Whether you’re taking lessons or experimenting with your style, the Go:Piano’s advanced keys are an ideal choice.

Specifications

Keyboard

  • Number of Keys: 61
  • Key Tops: Ivory feel
  • Key Shapes: Box-shape keys with velocity
  • Key Touch: 3 types, fixed touch

Sounds & Effects

  • Maximum Polyphony: 128 voices
  • MIDI Format: Conforms to GM2
  • Master Tuning: 415.3 Hz–466.2 Hz
  • Transpose: -5 to +6 in Semitones
  • Octave Shift: -3 to Plus 3
  • Sampling Frequency: 44.1kHz
  • Effects: Multi-effects, chorus, reverb, damper resonance (only for piano)
  • Tones
    • Piano: 10 tones
    • E Piano: 7 tones
    • Organ: 7 tones
    • Other: 16 tones (including a drum set, a SFX set)

General

  • Metronome: Quarter note = 5–300
  • Beat: 0/4, 2/4, 3/4, 4/4, 5/4, 6/4
  • Display: Character LCD (with Backlit)
  • Bluetooth: Version 4.2 (Profile Support: A2DP(Audio), GATT(MIDI over Bluetooth Low Energy) Codec: SBC (Support to the content protection of the SCMS-T method)
  • Amplifier Output: 2.5W x 2
  • Speakers: 2
  • Speaker Size: 12 x 6 cm (4-3/4 x 2-3/8 inches) x 2
  • Power Supply: AC adaptor or Alkaline battery
  • Current Draw: 500mA
  • Included Accessories: Owner's manual, Safety Leaflet, AC Adaptor, Music Rest
  • Colour: Black

Recorder

  • Save Format: Standard MIDI Files (Format 0)
  • Song Storage:99 songs (within the limits of Note Storage)
  • Note Storage: Approx. 30,000 notes
  • Tempo: Quarter note = 5–300
  • Resolution: 96 ticks per quarter note

Connectors

  • Phones/Output Jack: Stereo Miniature
  • Aux In Jack: Stereo Miniature
  • Pedal Jack: 1/4-Inch Phone Type
  • USB Computer Port: USB Micro-B Type (MIDI)
  • Power Port: DC IN Jack

Dimensions

  • Width: 877mm
  • Height with Music Rest: 254mm
  • Depth with Music Rest: 314mm
  • Weight excluding AC Adaptor and Music Rest: 3.9KG

fields.name: VISIONKEY-200 Digital Piano, with Bluetooth & 3-Pedal Stand
fields.short_description:
• Stream and play-along to your favourite songs and backing tracks via Bluetooth
  • Features 88 velocity sensitive keys
  • Includes 128 sounds, 83 rhythms, and 61 songs
  • Capture and store song ideas using the integrated recording system
  • Comes complete with stand
fields.description:
Full Description

VISIONKEY-200 Portable Digital Stage Piano, with Bluetooth

Bluetooth Connectivity

The VISIONKEY-200 keyboard is equipped with Bluetooth connectivity. This feature is incredibly convenient for musicians of all levels, as it allows for easy integration with external devices such as mobile phones, laptops, or tablets. With Bluetooth connectivity, you can easily play your music back through the keyboard's integrated speakers, allowing you to play along with your favourite songs and backing tracks.

Immersive Playing

The Digital Keyboard features a 128 note polyphony, which allows for the smooth and uninterrupted playing of even the most complex pieces. Polyphony refers to the number of notes that can be played simultaneously, and having a higher polyphony count means that more notes can be played without any dropouts or cut-offs. With 128 note polyphony, the VISIONKEY-200 ensures that every note played is heard clearly and accurately.

Wide Range of Sounds

The VISIONKEY-200 boasts 128 sounds, including a variety of pianos, electric pianos, organs, strings, and synths. With such a diverse range of sounds, the VISIONKEY-200 is suitable for a wide range of musical genres, from classical to pop and everything in between. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned player, the extensive sound library of the VISIONKEY-200 offers endless possibilities for musical exploration and creativity.

Handy Modes

Split and dual modes enable users to experiment with different sounds and expand their playing options. Split mode divides the keyboard into two sections for playing different sounds with each hand, for example a bass line and melody. Dual mode allows layering of two different sounds for a richer, fuller sound. Both modes are easily accessible and can be customised for unique sound combinations.

Capture Ideas

The Portable Digital Keyboard offers an intuitive recorder that lets you record and layer your performances with ease. This recording and playback function is perfect for those who want to capture and save their performances or even use them as a learning tool for later.

Versatile Connection Points

The VISIONKEY-200 comes equipped with a variety of connectivity options, making it a versatile and flexible instrument to work with. With USB MIDI, 1/4" Jack, and 5-pin DIN pedal connections, you can easily connect the keyboard to a computer, as well as hook up pedals for added expression and control. The L+R 1/4" Jack outputs allow you to connect the keyboard to external speakers or a mixing board in stereo for live performances or recording sessions, while the two headphone outputs make it convenient for two people to practice or perform together without disturbing others.

Instant Backing Tracks

Auto-accompaniment provides a backing band at the touch of a button, making it easier to create complex and full-sounding arrangements. With 83 built-in rhythms, the keyboard can generate accompaniments for a wide range of genres, including Pop, Rock, Jazz, and more. The accompaniments can be customised to suit individual playing styles, you can even adjust the tempo, volume, and instrumentation to suit your needs. This mode is perfect for solo performers, songwriters, or anyone looking to create fun full-sounding arrangements quickly and easily.

VISIONKEY-200 Portable Digital Keyboard Stand

The VISIONKEY-200 Portable Digital Keyboard Stand has been specifically designed to fit and support the VISIONKEY-200 Portable Digital Keyboard, ensuring stability and safety while in use. One of the key features of this keyboard stand is its ease of assembly. It can be easily set up and taken down without any special tools or expertise.

The VISIONKEY-200 Portable Digital Keyboard Stand also comes complete with an integrated three-pedal system. This system is designed to enhance the overall performance of the keyboard, providing the user with the feel of playing a grand piano, as well as greater control and flexibility. The pedals are built to withstand continued use, ensuring a long lifespan for the stand.

Specifications

VISIONKEY-200 Portable Digital Stage Piano, with Bluetooth

  • Keys: 88, Velocity Sensitive
  • Polyphony: 128 notes
  • Voices: 128
  • Rhythms: 83
  • Songs: 61
  • Dimensions: 1350mm x 90mm x 285mm
  • Weight: 6kg
  • Power: 12V DC/3000mA via 110-240V PSU (included)
  • Connectivity:
    • USB MIDI
    • 1/4” Jack Sustain
    • 5-pin DIN pedal connections
    • Dual 1/4” Jack Outputs
    • 2 x Headphone Outputs
    • Bluetooth Audio
  • Speakers: 2 x 10W

VISIONKEY-200 Portable Digital Keyboard Stand

  • Weight: 11.8kg
  • Dimensions (W x H x D): 1302mm x 660mm x 280mm
